column4: Im wanting to have one ubuntu server set up in one location and another set up ~ 25 miles away I want them to connect to eachother and mirror selected directories over a vpn any advice on how to do this?
mainly a lamp but we might use it for print server as well
amenado! mainly using it for a local lamp on the first location but need to transfer files from one location to the next os we were just wanting to basically sync the two directories
I think I read something once a while back about using SVN for that.
